name: Impact II Mining Laser
description:
Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Item Type: Mining Laser 
Size: 2
Optimal Range: 60m
Maximum Range: 300m
Power Transfer: 2200
Instability: +10%
Resistance: -25%
Optimal Charge Window: +30%
Optimal Charge Rate: +20%
Overcharge Rate: +50%
Shatter Damage: +75%
Extraction Throughput: 0.45 SCU/s
Consumable Slots: 3
Mine difficult deposits easier and faster with the Impact II. Thermyte Concern created special focus lenses to increase the laser's power and provide the precision required for a larger optimal charge window. This powerful size two mining laser does require careful management, as deposits will overheat quicker and explode with more force.
description_cn:
制造商：铝热公司(Thermyte Concern)
物品类型：采矿激光器 
尺寸：1
最佳距离：60m
最大距离：300m
能量传输：2200
充能绿区：+30%
绿区充能速率：+20%
开采抗性：-25%
不稳定性：+10%
爆裂伤害：+75%
过载速率：+50%
耗材插槽：3
开采速率：0.45 SCU/s
通过冲击II型,采矿将会变得更快更容易,铝热公司创新性地使用了特殊的激光透镜,以增大激光器的功率并提供更大的充能绿色区域以便开采.这种强大的冲击II激光器需要小心使用,因为矿物很容易因为快速过热而发生更剧烈的爆炸.
